remarks: Deduction form of ~ trel .  In a transitive class, the membership relation is transitive.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 3-Dec-2015.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
trelded.1 $e |- ( ph -> Tr A ) $.
trelded.2 $e |- ( ps -> B e. C ) $.
trelded.3 $e |- ( ch -> C e. A ) $.
trelded $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) -> B e. A ) $.
